stickies.sticky: This app uses the Cyntaxic framework. It is a MVC based pattern created to address everyday coding, while keeping it simple by reducing abstraction.
Top level objects like root& stage can be referenced statically from theCyntaxic base class. It also comes bundled with a bunch of commonly used utility functions and a built in debuggr.
Starting up is easy. Just extend CynModel and CynController, pass themin the document class to Cyntaxic.init(), thenextend CynComposite and CynComponent for theviews. Your done!
